body: The first part was so fucking good and has some potential but the second and the last was fucked up
Mix of vanilla, ntr, and seriously fucked up

2nd story seems fucked up even more than it already is. The husband pays for the other girl’s debts and releases her rather than his wife. She’s happy and can’t wait to leave the place behind and is shattered by the revelation. I’m assuming he leaves her behind and goes with the other girl. The first 3/4 of the story looks like he’s always fucking up some way or other. Looks like debts, marriage against parents’ will etc. I’m not sure cause I didn’t translate that part.
